parts.text: Generate an NPC for a fantasy-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Windswept Forest' described as 'A dense forest filled with ancient trees and hidden dangers.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 1/10 (Inferior).

{ "npc": {"name": "Tommy the Lost", "rank": 1, "backstory": "Tommy is a young boy who wandered into the Windswept Forest and got lost. With no survival skills and a vivid imagination, he often tells tales of giant beasts and magical creatures that he claims to have seen, although no one believes him. He is harmless and has befriended some of the forest animals, often seen talking to them as if they were his friends."} }

Generate an NPC for a steampunk-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Cogsworth Alley' described as 'A narrow street filled with steam-powered contraptions and eccentric inventors.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 2/10 (Basic).

{ "npc": {"name": "Gizmo", "rank": 2, "backstory": "Gizmo is an apprentice inventor who dreams of creating the next great invention. With a backpack full of tools and a mind buzzing with ideas, he spends his days tinkering in Cogsworth Alley. Though his creations often malfunction, his enthusiasm is infectious, and he often helps others with their mechanical problems, albeit with mixed results."} }

Generate an NPC for a post-apocalyptic-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'The Ruined Market' described as 'A desolate and abandoned marketplace, now home to scavengers and survivors.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 3/10 (Common).

{ "npc": {"name": "Rusty", "rank": 3, "backstory": "Rusty is a seasoned scavenger who calls The Ruined Market his home. He's known for his sharp wit and even sharper barter skills. He lost his family in the Collapse, and since then, he's been surviving on his own, scavenging for anything he can sell or trade. He's got a knack for finding valuable trinkets amidst the rubble, and he's always willing to share his knowledge with those who are willing to pay the price."} }

Generate an NPC for a medieval-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Knight's Rest Inn' described as 'A cozy inn frequented by weary travelers and knights alike.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 4/10 (Uncommon).

{ "npc": {"name": "Mira the Innkeeper", "rank": 4, "backstory": "Mira runs the Knight's Rest Inn with a kind heart and a sharp tongue. Once a wandering knight herself, she settled down after a fateful encounter left her with a sense of purpose. She now serves hearty meals and offers a warm bed to those who protect the realm, always eager to share stories from her adventurous past."} }

Generate an NPC for a sci-fi-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Galactic Outpost' described as 'A remote space station that serves as a hub for traders and bounty hunters.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 5/10 (Rare).

{ "npc": {"name": "Rax the Bounty Hunter", "rank": 5, "backstory": "Rax is a notorious bounty hunter known throughout the galaxy for his ruthlessness and efficiency. Operating out of the Galactic Outpost, he has a reputation for bringing in high-value targets. Despite his fearsome reputation, he has a code of honor and will not harm the innocent. He is often sought out for his expertise in tracking down the galaxy's most elusive criminals."} }

Generate an NPC for a fantasy-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Eldergrove' described as 'An ancient forest said to be protected by spirits and magical creatures.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 6/10 (Unique).

{ "npc": {"name": "Elandra, Spirit Guardian", "rank": 6, "backstory": "Elandra is a mystical being that has watched over Eldergrove for centuries. With an ethereal glow and the ability to communicate with nature, she protects the forest from any who would do it harm. Legends say that she was once a human druid who sacrificed her life to save the forest and now serves as its guardian, guiding lost souls and aiding those who seek to protect the land."} }

Generate an NPC for a mythical-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'The Celestial Summit' described as 'A mystical mountain peak where the veil between worlds is thin.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 7/10 (Epic).

{ "npc": {"name": "Thalor, Keeper of Secrets", "rank": 7, "backstory": "Thalor is an ancient being tasked with guarding the secrets of the universe atop The Celestial Summit. He possesses immense knowledge and power, able to glimpse into the threads of fate. Seekers of wisdom journey to him, but few are deemed worthy of his teachings. Thalor's cryptic words can guide or mislead, depending on the purity of the seekerâ€™s heart."} }

Generate an NPC for a pirate-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'Treasure Cove' described as 'A hidden cove known for its bountiful treasures and treacherous waters.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 8/10 (Legendary).

{ "npc": {"name": "Captain Redbeard", "rank": 8, "backstory": "Captain Redbeard is a legendary pirate feared across the seven seas. Known for his cunning tactics and unmatched swordsmanship, he amassed a fortune of treasures hidden in Treasure Cove. His ship, the 'Crimson Tide,' is a symbol of his reign over the waters. While many seek his riches, few survive to tell the tale. Rumor has it that he guards a secret map leading to the ultimate treasure, hidden deep within the cove's labyrinthine passages."} }

Generate an NPC for a space opera-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'The Galactic Nexus' described as 'A sprawling space station where civilizations from across the universe converge.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 9/10 (Mythic).

{ "npc": {"name": "Zarok the Celestial Sage", "rank": 9, "backstory": "Zarok is a mythic figure in the galaxy, revered as the Celestial Sage. Residing in The Galactic Nexus, he possesses unparalleled knowledge of the universe and its mysteries. Legends speak of his ability to foresee cosmic events and guide civilizations toward prosperity or ruin. Pilgrims and adventurers alike seek his counsel, but only those deemed worthy can approach him. His cryptic prophecies and profound insights shape the course of interstellar conflicts and alliances."} }

Generate an NPC for a mythological-themed game. The NPC should be suitable for a location named 'The Summit of the Gods' described as 'A celestial peak where deities gather to watch over the mortal realm.' The NPC should have a backstory and should be based on their rank, which is 10/10 (Divine).

{ "npc": {"name": "Zephyra, Goddess of the Winds", "rank": 10, "backstory": "Zephyra is the Divine Goddess of the Winds, revered by sailors and travelers alike. Residing at The Summit of the Gods, she commands the skies and guides the winds that carry ships across oceans and heroes into battle. Her laughter can be heard in the rustling leaves and her whispers in the breezes that brush against the earth. Those who seek her blessings often leave offerings at her temple, hoping for safe travels and favorable winds. Legends tell of her ability to summon tempests when angered, reminding all of her formidable power."} }

Respond exactly and concisely with a JSON object that follows this format: { "npc": {"name": "NPC Name", "rank": rankValue, "backstory": "NPC backstory."} }. Use the theme, Rank of the npc, its location details specified by the user to customize the NPC details. If the input is invalid, do not return the JSON.
